query: select * from highway where highway in ('motorway') and (tunnel is null or tunnel != 'yes')
select * from highway where highway in ('trunk') and (tunnel is null or tunnel != 'yes')
select * from highway where highway in ('primary') and (tunnel is null or tunnel != 'yes')
select * from highway where highway in ('secondary') and (tunnel is null or tunnel != 'yes')
select * from railway where railway in ('rail', 'light_rail', 'subway') and (tunnel is null or tunnel = 'no') and usage in ('main', 'branch')
select * from railway where railway in ('abandoned') and (tunnel is null or tunnel != 'yes')
select * from power where power in ('line')
select * from natural where natural = 'wetland' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from natural where natural = 'water' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from water where water in ('river', 'canal')
select * from natural where natural = 'cliff'
select * from natural where natural = 'wood' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from natural where natural = 'grassland' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from natural where natural in ('bare_rock', 'scree') and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from natural where natural in ('dune', 'sand') and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from natural where natural = 'scrub' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'brownfield' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'cemetery' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'commercial' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'construction' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'education' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from sport where sport = 'golf' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'grass' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'greenfield' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'industrial' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'institutional' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'landfill' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where leisure = 'park' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'quarry' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'recreation_ground' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'residential' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse = 'retail' and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
select * from landuse where landuse in ('farmland', 'farmyard') and OGR_GEOM_AREA > 0.0001
